ok,

I amusing "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" as my media type when I create
resources in the server.. it works, nice and easy...

The question is: how the client knows what parameters it should submit to
the server to create a new resource ?

is it a "previous knowledge" ?

In the case of AtomPub, there is a generic type used to create resources..
it is always the same type navigating between the client and the server..
but in case I want to use different types, how to inform the client about
the form contents ?

* I am in this learning curve here, so please understand and help if I am
just getting out of the curve :)

--0016e65aeee84b87bc0475bf534a
